imdb.title: Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo
imdb.plot: Ryu Yamada is kissing his normal life goodbye after he ends up in a bizarre body swap with honor student Urara Shiraishi!

episodes.title: Second Coming of the Suzaku Fest: A Hot Springs Resort! Everyone Gather Up!
episodes.plot: Yamada participates in Suzaku high school's clubs talent show. He and the Supernatural Studies club wasn't planning to do any efforts, but has to put up a good act after learning that the last place's club will be dissolved.

episodes.title: I Became Her
episodes.plot: Yamada Ryu, a second year High School student, falls down the stairs with honor student Shiraishi Urara. They faint, and when he wakes up in the infirmary, he discovers something incredible.

episodes.title: Kiss Me, Okay?
episodes.plot: Ito Miyabi, who loves supernatural phenomena, joins the Supernatural Studies Club. Miyabi shows off her supernatural paraphernalia so proudly that Yamada and the others can't tell her the truth: they only want to use the clubroom to kiss.

episodes.title: Will You Accept? Or Won't You?
episodes.plot: Miyabi is unhappy that the student council won't provide funding for the Supernatural Studies Club's research. Yamada isn't interested initially, but quickly changes his mind once he learns he could buy a microwave to warm up his beloved yakisoba bread.

episodes.title: It Looks Like I've Fallen for Yamada!
episodes.plot: Yamada is less than thrilled about going on the school camping trip, but changes his tune after discovering how fun the trip will be after switching bodies with Urara.

episodes.title: You Mustn't Kiss Her, Okay?
episodes.plot: Just as Yamada decides to hide the change to his kiss' power from from Urara, she urges him to switch bodies. He'd better go see Odagiri Nene and get his power back to normal in a hurry!

episodes.title: Respond!
episodes.plot: The Supernatural Studies Club holds a summer retreat in order to find volume two of the notebook containing the legend of the witches. However, Yamada's spirits plummet as he is forced to take supplementary lessons with the Manga Research Club.

episodes.title: Anything But Tempura!
episodes.plot: Yamada begins searching for the witches and visits the home of the fourth witch, Sarushima Maria, who is a shut-in taking a break from school. When they're alone, she tells him that her power is to see the future of the person she kisses.

episodes.title: You're So Annoying
episodes.plot: Yamada's group gets roped into making a group of first-year problem students behave in order to open a yakisoba bread stand at the cultural festival.

episodes.title: Please Go Out with Me
episodes.plot: The Supernatural Studies Club meets Miyamura's sister, Leona, in their search for the seventh witch, who has the power to erase all of a person's memories related to witches!

episodes.title: What did you do with Shiraishi
episodes.plot: Unable to stand by and do nothing after seeing Urara's tears, Yamada tries to kiss her to prove she's really a witch, but she refuses. Yamada and Tamaki, unwilling to give up, continue trying to find a way to restore everyone's lost memories.

episodes.title: I Love You, Shiraishi!
episodes.plot: Yamada must get all the witches together to conduct the seven witches' ceremony, and the last three needed are Urara, Mikoto, and Rika.
